title: The doctrine of the Trinity and transubstantiation compared as to Scripture, reason, and tradition. The first part in a new dialogue between a Protestant and a papist : wherein an answer is given to the late proofs of the antiquity of transubstantiation in the books called Consensus veterum and Nubes testium, &c.
author: Stillingfleet, Edward, 1635-1699.
notes: Written by Edward Stillingfleet.  Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
